snippet.title: My Sweet Confession Trailer
snippet.description:
Ichika invites you to play the new visual novel from Snowhaven Studios, My Sweet Confession! Can she rise to the occasion and confess her love to Hana properly, or will she crack under the pressure and fall back to her ditzy self? 

Play My Sweet Confession now!
Purchase on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1281140/My_Sweet_Confession/
Purchase on Itch - https://waddling.itch.io/my-sweet-confession
-----

Dialogue:
"Hi there! My name's Ichika, and I am in LOVE! Her name is Hana and...well...she WAS my best friend. We had a falling out, but I know deep down she feels the same...or ...at least I hope she does.
My friend Ayumi thinks I'm too much of a ditz to confess to her properly, but I'm going to prove her wrong! Of course, with my luck, things don't always go according to plan. See what happens in My Sweet Confession!"

Follow Snowhaven Studios on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SnowhavenStudio
See our other visual novels: https://snowhavenstudios.com/our-titles/

-----

Game Synopsis:
"My Sweet Confession is an enchanting yuri visual novel about a school girl in love with her best friend...if only she knew how to show it! The hapless, lovestruck Ichika made a mistake, a big one, and she might have ruined her friendship with Hana forever. With the help of her classmate Ayumi, can she work her own feelings out in time to show Hana how she really feels? A soft, comedic romance with big personalities and a tinge of melodrama."

-----

Cast:
Amanda Parker (Ichika)
https://twitter.com/ZaPanda_VA

Mango Shores (Hana)
https://twitter.com/va_mango

Julia Gu (Ayumi)
https://twitter.com/JuliaGuVO

Yume (Teacher)
https://twitter.com/yumeparadox

Nathalie Ferare (Boy)
https://twitter.com/NFerare

Kathy Pfautsch (Mom)
https://twitter.com/PAsInPfautsch

-----

Creative Team:
Art Director - Hadara Madrak
https://twitter.com/PogoNR

Audio Director - Kanono
https://twitter.com/PuddleKanono/

Voice Director - Ashe Thurman
https://twitter.com/pixelsandpins/
